biotools.summary: Community resource for comparative analysis of publicly available genomes in a comprehensive integrated context. It contains both draft and complete microbial genomes integrated with other publicly available genomes from all three domains of life, together with a large number of plasmids and viruses. It provides tools and viewers for analyzing and reviewing the annotations of genes and genomes in a comparative context.

bioschemas.name: Integrated Microbial Genomes (IMG)
